name: MEC Terrena Stretch Convertible Pants - Women's
description:
Super-stretchy convertible pants for tackling steep switchbacks on a day hike or heading out on a multi-day trip. They zip off into shorts for hot weather.  An internal drawcord with belt loops lets you tune the fit in the waist. The gusseted crotch and articulated knees increase your range of motion, and the fabric dries out quickly, in case creek crossings don’t go as planned.Made of a stretchy, quick-drying nylon and spandex blend with a DWR (durable water repellency) finish to shed water and dirt.Fabric provides a UPF 50+ rating.Zipper fly with button closure.Side zippered pocket on seam and zippered back pockets to keep your stuff safe when you're active.Zip off into shorts.Each pant leg has different coloured zippers so you don’t get them mixed up.Straight leg openings.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering
